Indian start-up Mensa Brands has catapulted to billion-dollar unicorn status in just six months and, in a more rarified feat, is already profitable, its founder told CNBC.

articles.title: Tatas to merge AirAsia India with Air India Express: Report - India Today
articles.description: Tata Sons has reportedly started the process to merge low-fare carrier AirAsia India with Air India Express. The development comes after it secured the bid to acquire Air India in October.
